Package war

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Card
    A class to represent a single Card
    Deck
    Represents a deck of cards - fills with a standard deck of 52 cards by default and is shuffled upon creation.
    GameOutput
    Handles all the output
    Menu
    The class which contains the main method for running War Allows a user to input a variation of War to play: Two players play cards until one deck is empty with the winner claiming cards after a war is run, or until 4000 rounds have passed. Two players play cards until their decks are empty, keeping score with the cards that are won in each war Three players play with the same rules as variation 2. The game is made with a mainDeck to ensure that unique cards are used and put into each hand - once the cards are dealt from the main hand, mainDeck is no longer used
    Player
    Extends Deck, and adds four members (String name, int handSize, Deck hand, int Score) and aside from getters and setters adds one new method (buildHand).
    PointSystem  
    Turn  
    Winner
    Contains a Player object and a Card object
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Rank
    An Enum for card ranks Card ranks begin with a value of 2 and end with 14 in ascending order from Two to Ace
    Suit
    An Enum for card suits
